sen.j: 藤原 濱雄（ふじわら の はまお、生年不詳 - 承和 (日本)7年7月28日 (旧暦)（840年9月1日））は平安時代の公家。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Hamao (year of birth not known; died on September 1 840 (lunar calendar)) was a court noble who lived in the Heian Period.
FUJIWARA no Hamao (year of birth not known; died on September 1 840 (lunar calendar)) was a court noble who lived in the Heian Period.
FUJIWARA no Hamao (year of birth not known; died on September 1, 840) was a court noble who lived in the Heian period.
sen.cmt: カンマ追加、グレゴリオ暦表記のため、(lunar calendar)削除、Heian periodとしました。

sen.j: 藤原北家藤原真夏の三男。
sen.e: He was the third son of FUJIWARA no Manatsu of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
He was the third son of FUJIWARA no Manatsu of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
He was the third son of FUJIWARA no Manatsu of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
His mother was from the Mikuni clan.
His mother was from the Mikuni clan.
His mother was from the Mikuni clan.

sen.j: 位は従五位下民部少輔。
sen.e: His rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), and Minbu Shoyu (Junior Assitant Minister of Popular Affairs). [http://www.albany.edu/eas/205/rank%20chart.htm]
His rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), and Minbu Shoyu (Junior Assitant Minister of Popular Affairs). [http://www.albany.edu/eas/205/rank%20chart.htm]
His rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), and Minbu Shoyu (Junior Assitant Minister of Popular Affairs).

sen.j: 子には藤原家宗・藤原門宗・藤原貞則・藤原飽永・藤原益友らがいる。
sen.e: He had children including FUJIWARA no Iemune, FUJIWARA no Kadomune, FUJIWARA no Sadanori, FUJIWARA no Akinaga? (藤原飽永) and FUJIWARA no Masutomo? (藤原益友).
He had children including FUJIWARA no Iemune, FUJIWARA no Kadomune, FUJIWARA no Sadanori, FUJIWARA no Akinaga? (藤原飽永) and FUJIWARA no Masutomo? (藤原益友).
He had children including FUJIWARA no Iemune, FUJIWARA no Kadomune, FUJIWARA no Sadanori, FUJIWARA no Akinaga (藤原飽永) and FUJIWARA no Masutomo (藤原益友).
sen.cmt: "?"を削除し、FUJIWARA no Akinaga (藤原飽永)、およびFUJIWARA no Masutomo (藤原益友)としました。

sen.j: 嵯峨天皇・淳和天皇・仁明天皇の三代に仕えた。
sen.e: He served three emperors, i.e. the Emperor Saga, the Emperor Junna and the Emperor Ninmyo.
He served three emperors, i.e. the Emperor Saga, the Emperor Junna and the Emperor Ninmyo.
He served three emperors, i.e. the Emperor Saga, the Emperor Junna and the Emperor Ninmyo.
